00073 public:
00080     explicit CustomBondForce(const std::string& energy);

00085         return bonds.size();
00086     }

00091         return parameters.size();
00092     }

00097         return globalParameters.size();
00098     }

00135     int addGlobalParameter(const std::string& name, double defaultValue);
00142     const std::string& getGlobalParameterName(int index) const;

00172     int addBond(int particle1, int particle2, const std::vector<double>& parameters);
00181     void getBondParameters(int index, int& particle1, int& particle2, std::vector<double>& parameters) const;
